title: Riders by Lee Indigo Women's Ultra Soft Denim Capri
description: Five Pocket Styling; Back pockets feature embroidery

This Riders by Lee Indigo ultra soft denim capri will quickly become your go to casual bottom. Made from premium super soft denim, this capri sits just above your natural waist and has a traditional rise. The 19 inch inseam hits mid calf on most. Why sacrifice comfort for style when you can have them both
